data.enText: an official examination of business and financial records to see that they are true and correct
an official examination of the quality or standard of sth
to officially examine the financial accounts of a company
to attend a course at college or university but without taking any exams or receiving credit

simple_means.memory_skill: audit 听 → 旁听，引申为审计

tr: a methodical examination or review of a condition or situation
example: he made an audit of all the plants on his property

tr: an inspection of the accounting procedures and records by a trained accountant or CPA
attend academic courses without getting credit
examine carefully for accuracy with the intent of verification

value.def: When an accountant audits an organization's accounts, he or she examines the accounts officially in order to make sure that they have been done correctly.

example.ex: Each year they audit our accounts and certify them as being true and fair.
example.tran: 他们每年对我们进行账务审核，以确保其真实无误。

example.ex: The bank first learned of the problem when it carried out an internal audit.
example.tran: 银行是在进行内部审计的时候首次发现了这个问题。

trans: 审计轨迹(指用来进行审查的详细记录)
绿色审计， 环保审计 (就某一公司对环境的影响作出的评估)

partsOfSpeech.dec: aud 听 + ible 能…的 → 听得见的；可听的
audi 听 + ence 表名词 → 听的人 → 听众
audi 听 + ology …学 → 听觉学
audio〔= audi〕听 + meter 测量计 → 测听器
audit 听 → 旁听，引申为审计
audit 听 + ion 表动作 → 听〔歌手〕唱 → 试听
audit 听 + or 表人 → 旁听生；审计员
audit 听 + orium 场所 → 听〔布道〕的场所 → 礼堂
in 不 + aud 听 + ible 能…的 → 听不见的
